Big News! Monster Rancher Advance 3 Is In Production!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2003 Topics (Year of the Counter): Big News! Monster Rancher Advance 3 Is In Production!
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, August 6, 2003 - 11:29 am:

Here's an exclusive scoop you will not find anyplace online or in print! There is an MRA3 planned! No release date yet, and virtually no info at all except that Tecmo does want to make the game. While Kanematsu-sama was visiting the US office, Brian asked about the possibility of a MRA3, and was told yes, one was in the works.

"Maybe Spring 2004???" -Brian 'Finn' Hoisko @ Tecmo

If you don't have a GBA yet, or a Game Cube GBA player, I strongly recommend getting one! The MRA games are excellent, and MRA2 is truly exceptional. MRA2 has hundreds of hours of gameplay, a complex storyline, tons of monsters, exploring -in short, everything that makes a MR game fun to play!
